•Every year at the same time, the hair on your back starts standing on end and your teeth start chattering like a Chafer's bones half-way through a marathon. Are you cold? No! YOU'RE SCARED! Yes, the Al Howin dungeon has opened its doors! Will you be brave enough to set foot in there?
•From October 27th to November 6th, a new challenge awaits you with the Dungeon Rusher Maxxx. – you won't have time to get bored!
•Various problems corrected, and game stability improved.

INCARNAM REVAMP
- Incarnam has been redesigned to accommodate players up to level 50.
- The areas of the island has been redesigned and now has 5 sub-zones of different levels: Meadows, Fields, Lake, Forest, and Wasteland.
- Each sub-zone hosts a unique family of monsters.
- The terrain has been revised for easier navigation. The island around the edges have been removed, some gaps have been filled etc...
- The NPC Fairy Sette in Incarnam allows you to reset the characteristics and spells to level 40.
- The Incarnam dungeon is now level 40. It hosts the new monsters in the area alongside Snoowolf.
- New quests and achievements related to Incarnam lairs have been added.

NEW FEATURE: LAIRS
- A new PvM system has been added: the lairs. These are 1 on 1 fights against monsters.
- There are 5 lairs on Incarnam, ranging from level 10 to level 50.
- In each lair, it will be possible to face two different guardians. Defeating the celestial gurdian gives you the chance to loot new set items.

INTERFACE

Smithmagic and Cooperation Crafting:
- It is now possible to link the recipe or item in chat from the crafting interface.
- It is now possible to transfer runes with a double tap action. The drag & drop action is still functional and will ask you to specify the amount of runes to be transferred (maximum default value).
- A tap on an item selects it (outlined in orange), and opens the context menu.
- If an item can’t be transferred (for example: the target slot is full, or if the craftsman is not allowed to add his own runes, etc.), the item will not be outlined in orange, only the context menu will be displayed.
- If an item can’t be moved, the item remains in the inventory so that the player does not waste time finding where it could be placed.
- A tap on a selected item (when the outline is orange) is equivalent to a double tap action.
- If a transfer is possible to or from the craft interface and the ingredient bag, only a double tap is now required.
- If a transfer is possible to or from the craft interface and the ingredient bag, only a double tap is now required.
- When runes are transferred, the entire stack is moved through the double tap action. When transferring items, only one item is transferred if it is part of a stack.
- Transferring via double tap action
- A double tap on an item allows it to be sent to its intended destination.
- If tapping on a selected item would send the whole stack, the outline frame uses a slightly different color (yellow - orange).

Standard Crafting
- The empty slot where the item will be placed is outlined in white.
- Slots that are already in use are no longer outlined when moving an item or resource to the craft interface.

Market
- It is now possible to search and sort Soul Stones by name.
- The name of the most important monster in its family is displayed in the list of elements of the Auction House.

World Map
- A new icon category has been added to the world map to show or hide the lairs. These are represented by a sword icon (formerly the conquest icon). Conquests, on the other hand, are now represented by a prism icon.

MISCELLANEOUS
- The game maps have been updated to correct bugs of missing elements on some of them.
- Many faulty map interactions have been corrected.
- The beginner channel is available again for adventurers below level 50.

The island of Vulkania opens its doors for the first time in DOFUS Touch! Until the end of summer you can:
•Face two new bosses.
•Get the Emotes "Vulkanian Salute", "Superhero", "Lizard", "Stock".
•Participate in the competition between the villages of Vulkorog and Otomaisle.
•Catch a typically vulkan mount: the Madreggon!
•Win the Magmatic Set and the Quartzotic Set.
•Acquire a level 190 or higher weapon...
•And get over 40 achievements!

•There are two new lairs in the Astrub Rocky Inlet! In them, you'll find new bosses, new quests, new achievements and new equipment.
•A push notification system has been added; manage your notifications directly in the game settings.
•In the Marketplace, the lowest prices are now shown by default for each quantity range.
•Other improvements and fixes can be found in the changelog available at http://www.dofus-touch.com

- A new area is available for Halloween: The Horrib Isle! There, you'll find new monsters, new bosses, new quests, and new equipment for players between level 50 and 200.
- Al Howin's Stewpot is opening its doors: 8 achievements have been added this level-100 dungeon.
- It is now possible to know the crafts available from the resources in the Shop's inventory.
- Find the changelog at http://www.dofus-touch.com

- It is now possible to know the crafts available from the resources in the Shop's inventory.
- Find the changelog at http://www.dofus-touch.com

•An anti-attack consumable is now available in the in-game Shop.
•Other improvements and fixes can be found in the changelog, available at http://www.dofus-touch.com.
